questions.question: What is the main objective of SDG 4?

options.text: To ensure inclusive and equitable quality education for all
To improve healthcare access for all

questions.explanation: The main objective of SDG 4 is to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education for all.

questions.question: Which of the following is a major barrier to achieving quality education in developing countries?
questions.explanation: Gender inequality is a major barrier to achieving quality education in developing countries.

questions.question: What global statistic is used to measure access to education?
questions.explanation: The literacy rate is a global statistic used to measure access to education.

questions.question: Which region faces the highest levels of educational disparity due to conflict and poverty?
questions.explanation: Sub-Saharan Africa faces the highest levels of educational disparity due to conflict and poverty.

questions.question: Which SDG is most closely related to the achievement of SDG 4?
questions.explanation: All of the mentioned SDGs (3, 6, and 8) are closely related to the achievement of SDG 4.
